billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Expands definition of service contracts to include contracts made by a supplier or seller of a service for repair of cracks or chips in a motor vehicle windshield
summary: Expands definition of service contracts to include contracts made by a supplier or seller of a service for repair of cracks or chips in a motor vehicle windshield and for repair or removal of dents, dings or creases from a motor vehicle without affecting the existing paint finish.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to service contracts
